idea-plugin.name: ClickUp Integration
idea-plugin.description:
ClickUp Integration for IntelliJ Platform

Enhance your productivity by integrating ClickUp with JetBrains IDEs. Manage your tasks seamlessly and track time spent on each task within your development environment.

Features

  • Fetches issues from ClickUp spaces to use as tasks.
  • Updates your tasks status from the IDE.
  • Time Tracking for Ultimate users with access to the time tracking bundle.

For now the plugin has limited functionality, but it is a work in progress. This plugin is an open source project, and is not officially supported by ClickUp, so contributions and feedback are equally welcome.

The logo is a registered trademark of ClickUp.
